sn15.14:1.2: “Mendicants, this transmigration has no known beginning. …
sn15.14:1.3: It’s not easy to find a sentient being who in all this long time has not previously been your mother.
sn15.14:1.5: This transmigration has no known beginning. …
sn15.14:1.6: This is quite enough for you to become disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed regarding all conditions.”
